Key Match Events: The Chicago Cubs blew a 6-0 lead and lost on a critical dropped ball in a high-pressure moment
Pre-Game Insights: Manager David Ross emphasized the team's resilience and confidence in bouncing back
Post-Match Reflections: The clubhouse did not blame Seiya Suzuki for the loss, using it as a motivator
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs have a slim chance to make the playoffs and are a half-game ahead of the Miami Marlins
